page.title: 10What Children Wear.
page.content:
Most of the the girls at our school wear jewellery. They have earrings and often wear rings and necklaces and bangles. They do not wear make-up but do use nail polish. At school they do not have a uniform but wear what they choose. Girls usually wear trainers, tight jeans, shorts or skirts. Not many girls wear dresses. Their tops are either tee-shirts, sweat-shirts and short sleeved woollen jumpers. Most of the girls have short hair and some of them have it permed.
Nearly all boys wear jeans and trainers at school. They also wear tee-shirts, jumpers and body-warmers. Their hair is usually short and some have it very short. Some boys wear earrings.
